events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item isn't what I expected and I'd like to request a refund for the purchase.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's description of the order problem.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund inquiry and follow up with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, could you also share the reason for the refund and if the product is unopened or used?
My order number is 123456789. The product doesn’t match the description on the website and was already opened when I received it.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a refund once you send the product back. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick reply. I appreciate you sending the shipping label and taking care of this.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The money should appear on your payment method in 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund was received successfully and to see if you need any further assistance.
Since there are no further questions, we will now close this refund case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
